column2: The thayan zulkirates are organized by the traditional schools of arcane magic, with each specializing in a single one and being governed by a specialist of that school.

Under the Red Wizards, territories are divided into Tarch ruled by Tarchions, who are elected by the Zulkirs themselves.
Under the Red Wizards, territories are divided into Tarch ruled by Tarchions, who in turn select Autarchs to rule smaller parts of the territory.
